name: Survive Your Poisons
description:
Submission for Godot Wild Jam #3.

The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible while having to take poisons that weakens you. Use WASD/ZQSD to move, left click to shoot and spacebar to roll.

It was our first game as a team of two and we kind of lacked time this week so the result is quite underwhelming but at least we get a bit used to work together for future jams.
